profile.aboutMe: I am an anime lover and passionate programmer. Currently, i am working in building enterprise application with JSF stack, and in a transition to modern web ecosystems for larger and smaller projects.
profile.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love whar you are doing, you will be successful.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Electronics Digital Mention and Microcomputation

experience.description: I am in charge of the technological part of the business, which includes giving support and maintenance to computers. Some tasks such as: contacting customers, chauffeur, mailing, invoicing and quote, etc. I am currently developing a project for J & A Soluciones, which allows the management of HR, inventory, invoicing, collections, payments, customers, suppliers, among others.

In the IDAC I am part of the team that develops the SIAGA project.
  1. Elicitation of requirements for maintenance of project subsystems.
  2. Development and implementation of modules and subsystems.
  3. Induction and training of IDAC staff to use the developed tools within the SIAGA project
Develop and maintain hybrid mobile applications and customs apis using Java, IONIC and AngularJs technologies. Manage the development and testing phases of the project.
